snippet: The United States was eliminated from hockey’s world junior championship with a 3-2 loss to Russia in the quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: The United States was eliminated from hockey’s world junior championship with a 3-2 loss to Russia in the quarterfinals.

headline.main: U.S. Loses to Russia in World Junior Championship
headline.print_headline: US loses 3-2 to Russia in world junior quarters
